data.name: Deadlokk
data.detailed_description:
You are part of a deep-space expedition, establish military supremacy to secure resources and technology by force.



Plan your journey and utilize the environment to benefit your fleet.
Crush enemies using superior technology found along your path.
Raid convoys, carriers and structures to strengthen your advantage.



Every class of ship has bonuses to different stats, along with their own specific abilities.
Exploit your ship's bonuses and abilities with equipment recovered from hostile ships.
Find your favorite build and adapt to any situation.



Recruit Co-Pilots to further your build with their powerful buffs and abilities.



Your carrier is your base, protect it at all costs.
Carriers can move anywhere on the map and are controlled by your fleet. Democratically decide the best course of action.
Collaborate with your team to upgrade your carrier using your team's resource pool.
data.about_the_game:
You are part of a deep-space expedition, establish military supremacy to secure resources and technology by force.



Plan your journey and utilize the environment to benefit your fleet.

data.short_description: Deadlokk is a 1-3 player co-op roguelike. Explore sectors while fighting against other factions to upgrade your ships and carrier. Find rare weapons and upgrades to make the perfect build. Research your items to make blueprints and take them on your future Expeditions!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
